name: One Second Cartographer
description:
This is my entry to GMTK Jam 2019. The theme: Only One

You have only 1 second to look at a map, and then you must guide your wagon to the Inn. Avoid hazards, such as forests, rivers, and swamps. Try not to lose too many Oxen.

Controls

Progress: E or Space or Enter

Move path: WASD or Arrow Keys

Exit (Windows): Esc

The path has to be at least 5 tiles long before you can move the wagon (path will become red). After your path is set, press E to move the wagon.

There are 5 levels in total.

Tools Used:

  • Game Engine: Unity 3D - https://unity.com/
  • Image Editing: Aseprite - https://www.aseprite.org/
  • Font: Bitty - https://masharcade.itch.io/bitty
